info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 3:47AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kendall, northeastern La Salle, eastern De Kalb, northern Grundy and southwestern Kane Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 347 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waterman to Sheridan to near Seneca. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... DeKalb, Oswego, Sycamore, Yorkville, Morris, Plano, Sandwich, Marseilles, Sheridan, Montgomery, Sugar Grove, Lake Holiday, Cortland, Seneca, Hinckley, Somonauk, Waterman, Maple Park, Newark and Millington. Including the following interstates... I-80 between mile markers 97 and 117. I-88 between mile markers 91 and 109. This includes...Northern Illinois University, Sandwich Fairgrounds, Gebhard Woods State Park, Grundy County Speedway and Fairgrounds, Waubonsee Community College, and William G Stratton State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
